com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi

Interface Server

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Exclusive<Server>, Runner
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicServer

    public interface Server
extends Runner, Exclusive<Server>

    This interface defines the behavior required to implement a server for handling and dispatching network connection requests.

    Author:
    Carter Waxman

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi.Runner

        Runner.RunnerState

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getConfiguredPort()
      Gets the port the server is configured to use.
      int getCurrentPort()
      Gets the port that the server is currently using.
      Runner.RunnerState getState()
      Determines whether the server is currently listening for connections.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.modapi.Runner

        pause, resume, start, stop

    • Method Detail

      • setPort

        void setPort(int port,
           boolean immediate)

        Sets the listening port for the server. The server must restart for this to take effect.

        Parameters:
        port - The new port number.
        immediate - True to restart the server immediately, false to restart it manually at a later time.

      • getConfiguredPort

        int getConfiguredPort()

        Gets the port the server is configured to use. This may be different from the actual listening port if a new port is set without restarting the server.

        Returns:
        The configured listening port.

      • getCurrentPort

        int getCurrentPort()

        Gets the port that the server is currently using.

        Returns:
        The current listening port or -1 if the server is not running.

      • getState

        Runner.RunnerState getState()

        Determines whether the server is currently listening for connections.

        Specified by:
        getState in interface Runner
        Returns:
        True if the server is running.
